verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, came אַחֲרֵ֛י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei Now after מ֥וֹת <WH4194> Mot the death מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh of Moses עֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> 'E-ved the servant יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer spake יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh it came to pass that the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' unto Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> bin- the son נ֔וּן <WH5126> Nun, of Nun מְשָׁרֵ֥ת <WH8334> me-sha-Ret minister מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh Moses' לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh Moses עַבְדִּ֖י <WH5650> 'av-Di my servant מֵ֑ת <WH4191> Met; is dead וְעַתָּה֩ <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah now ק֨וּם <WH6965> kum now therefore arise עֲבֹ֜ר <WH5674> 'a-Vor go over אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּ֣ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den this Jordan הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, this אַתָּה֙ <WH859> 'at-Tah you וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> ha-'Am thou and all this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, this אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz unto the land אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> no-Ten which I do give לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liv-Nei to them [even] to the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- Every מָק֗וֹם <WH4725> ma-Kom, Every place אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תִּדְרֹ֧ךְ <WH1869> tid-Roch shall tread upon כַּֽף־ <WH3709> kaf- that the sole רַגְלְכֶ֛ם <WH7272> rag-le-Chem of your foot בּ֖וֹ bo לָכֶ֣ם la-Chem נְתַתִּ֑יו <WH5414> ne-tat-Tiv; that have I given כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher which דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti unto you as I said אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. unto Moses

מֵהַמִּדְבָּר֩ <WH4057> me-ham-mid-Bar From the wilderness וְהַלְּבָנ֨וֹן <WH3844> ve-hal-le-va-Non and this Lebanon הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh and this וְֽעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- far הַנָּהָ֧ר <WH5104> han-na-Har river הַגָּד֣וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol even unto the great נְהַר־ <WH5104> ne-har- the river פְּרָ֗ת <WH6578> pe-Rat, Euphrates כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> kol all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz all the land הַֽחִתִּ֔ים <WH2850> ha-chit-Tim, of the Hittites וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- far הַיָּ֥ם <WH3220> hai-Yam sea הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol and unto the great מְב֣וֹא <WH3996> me-Vo toward the going down הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> hash-Sha-mesh; of the sun יִֽהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become גְּבוּלְכֶֽם׃ <WH1366> ge-vu-le-Chem. shall be your coast

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- No יִתְיַצֵּ֥ב <WH3320> yit-yatz-Tzev be able to stand אִישׁ֙ <WH376> 'ish There shall not any man לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-cha, before כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> ye-Mei thee all the days חַיֶּ֑יךָ <WH2416> chai-Yei-cha; of thy life כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher I הָיִ֤יתִי <WH1961> ha-Yi-ti have been עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mo-Sheh as I was with Moses אֶהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> 'eh-Yeh have been עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> 'im-Mach, with לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo No אַרְפְּךָ֖ <WH7503> 'ar-pe-Cha [so] I will be with thee I will not fail וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo No אֶעֶזְבֶֽךָּ׃ <WH5800> 'e-'ez-Ve-ka. thee nor forsake

חֲזַ֖ק <WH2388> cha-Zak Be strong וֶאֱמָ֑ץ <WH553> ve-'e-Matz; and of a good courage כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אַתָּ֗ה <WH859> 'at-Tah, you תַּנְחִיל֙ <WH5157> tan-Chil shalt thou divide for an inheritance אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> ha-'Am for unto this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, this אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי <WH7650> nish-Ba'-ti which I sware לַאֲבוֹתָ֖ם <WH1> la-'a-vo-Tam unto their fathers לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> la-Tet to give לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem.

רַק֩ <WH7535> rak but חֲזַ֨ק <WH2388> cha-Zak Only be thou strong וֶֽאֱמַ֜ץ <WH553> ve-'e-Matz courageous מְאֹ֗ד <WH3966> me-'Od, and very לִשְׁמֹ֤ר <WH8104> lish-Mor that thou mayest observe לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <WH6213> la-'a-sOt to do כְּכָל־ <WH3605> ke-chol- to all הַתּוֹרָ֗ה <WH8451> hat-to-Rah, according to all the law אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which צִוְּךָ֙ <WH6680> tziv-ve-Cha commanded מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh which Moses עַבְדִּ֔י <WH5650> 'av-Di, my servant אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תָּס֥וּר <WH5493> ta-Sur thee turn מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu at יָמִ֣ין <WH3225> ya-Min not from it [to] the right hand וּשְׂמֹ֑אול <WH8040> u-se-Mol; or [to] the left לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an so תַּשְׂכִּ֔יל <WH7919> tas-Kil, that thou mayest prosper בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> be-Chol to all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תֵּלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> te-Lech. go

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not יָמ֡וּשׁ <WH4185> ya-Mush shall not depart סֵפֶר֩ <WH5612> se-Fer This book הַתּוֹרָ֨ה <WH8451> hat-to-Rah of the law הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh This מִפִּ֗יךָ <WH6310> mip-Pi-cha, out of thy mouth וְהָגִ֤יתָ <WH1897> ve-ha-Gi-ta but thou shalt meditate בּוֹ֙ bo יוֹמָ֣ם <WH3119> yo-Mam therein day וָלַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> va-Lay-lah, and night לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> le-Ma-'an so תִּשְׁמֹ֣ר <WH8104> tish-Mor that thou mayest observe לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot, to do כְּכָל־ <WH3605> ke-chol- to all הַכָּת֖וּב <WH3789> hak-ka-Tuv according to all that is written בּ֑וֹ bo; כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for אָ֛ז <WH227> 'az then תַּצְלִ֥יחַ <WH6743> tatz-Li-ach prosperous אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דְּרָכֶ֖ךָ <WH1870> de-ra-Che-cha thy way וְאָ֥ז <WH227> ve-'Az and then תַּשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <WH7919> tas-Kil. and then thou shalt have good success
